WFFL.Karma Chameleons: The Chameleons have locked up a first-round bye and are the heavy favorite for the #1 seed at 73.7%. Their dominant 11-2 record has them cruising into the playoffs as the team to beat.
WFFL.Taco Bills: Taco Bills have clinched a bye week and will likely slot in at #2 (73.7%), though they still have an outside shot at stealing the top seed if things break their way.
WFFL.Royal Flush: Playoffs are secured for Royal Flush. They're battling for seeding between #3 (55.3%) and #5 (44.7%) - a win this week could mean home field advantage in Round 1.
WFFL.The Hack Attack: The Hack Attack is playoff-bound with the most variable seeding outlook - they could land anywhere from #3 to #5. Their Week 14 result will be crucial for bracket positioning.
WFFL.Junkyard Dogs: The Dogs have punched their playoff ticket and are most likely headed for the #4 seed (72.9%), setting up a first-round matchup against a division winner.
WFFL.MindHunter: MindHunter controls their playoff destiny with a 74% chance to grab the final spot. A win should seal the deal; a loss opens the door for the teams below.
WFFL.Goldenberg's Peanut Chews: The Peanut Chews are alive but need help - only a 14.4% playoff chance. They'll need to win and have MindHunter lose to sneak into the postseason.
WFFL.Ghost Legion: Ghost Legion's playoff hopes are fading at 11.6%. They need a win plus losses from both MindHunter and Goldenberg's to have any shot at the 6-seed.
WFFL.Ellis Islanders: Mathematically eliminated from playoff contention. The Islanders' season is over with no path to the postseason regardless of Week 14 results.
WFFL.Olympus Mons: Eliminated from the playoffs. Olympus Mons will be watching from the sidelines as the postseason unfolds.
WFFL.THE Washington (university) FT: Season over for THE Washington FT - no playoff scenarios remain. Time to start thinking about next year.
WFFL.Plundering Herd: The Herd has been eliminated and will finish at the bottom of the standings. A tough season comes to a close without postseason action.

DFFL.Boston Stranglers: Complete dominance. The Stranglers have locked up the #1 seed and a first-round bye in all 10,000 simulations. They'll be rested and ready for the semifinals.
DFFL.Hopewell Hitters: Playoffs secured with a coin-flip for seeding - 43.6% chance at #2 seed (bye) vs 56.4% at #4. Their Week 14 matchup could determine whether they get rest or have to play Round 1.
DFFL.Vanilla Thunder: Thunder has clinched and is the slight favorite for the #2 seed and bye (56.4%). A win likely locks up the bye; a loss could drop them to the 4-seed.
DFFL.Air Nomad: Locked into the #3 seed in every simulation. Air Nomad knows exactly where they'll be - hosting a Wild Card team in Round 1.
DFFL.Sac-Busters: The Sac-Busters have clinched but are locked into the #5 seed. They'll be on the road in Round 1 regardless of this week's outcome.
DFFL.St. Paul Soaks: Strong position for the final playoff spot at 83.2%. A win clinches; a loss still likely gets them in, but they'd be sweating out the other results.
DFFL.Al's Offenders: Longshot playoff hopes at 9.2%. Al's Offenders need to win and have St. Paul Soaks lose to have any realistic chance at sneaking in.
DFFL.Kona Heads: Barely alive at 7.6% playoff probability. Would need a win plus multiple results to break their way - an unlikely but not impossible scenario.
DFFL.Novato Dawgs: Eliminated from playoff contention. The Dawgs' season ends without a trip to the postseason.
DFFL.The Next Generation: No path to the playoffs remains. The Next Generation will be spectators for the championship run.
DFFL.Pat's Lads: Mathematically eliminated. Pat's Lads finish outside the playoff picture regardless of Week 14 outcomes.
DFFL.Rockville Reavers: Season over - eliminated from playoff contention. The Reavers will look to build for next year.

FFPL.Boomie's Boys: The Boys have dominated and locked up the #1 seed with a bye. They'll watch Round 1 from the couch before entering the playoffs fully rested.
FFPL.Los Pollos Hermanos: Los Pollos has clinched the #2 seed and first-round bye in every simulation. They'll be waiting to face the winner of the 3/6 matchup.
FFPL.Mobius Strippers: Playoffs secured, battling between #4 (43.6%) and #5 (56.4%) seeds. Either way, they're in the Wild Card round with a chance to make a run.
FFPL.The ReBiggulators: The ReBiggulators are playoff-bound, likely as the #4 seed (56.4%). They're jockeying with Mobius for positioning in the first round.
FFPL.The Original Series: Clinched playoffs with a fascinating split - 52.1% at #3 (hosting Round 1) vs 47.9% at #6 (road game). Week 14 is huge for their seeding.
FFPL.Free The Nip: Mirror image of Original Series - 47.9% at #3 vs 52.1% at #6. These two are essentially in a head-to-head battle for the better seed.
FFPL.Gashouse Gorillas: Safe! The Gorillas have avoided both playoffs and relegation. They'll finish in the middle of the pack with nothing on the line Week 14.
FFPL.Hampden Has-Beens: In danger territory with 54% relegation playoff probability. A win this week could be the difference between safety and fighting for survival.
FFPL.Lester Pearls: Facing 59.1% chance of relegation playoffs. The Pearls need a win and some help to avoid the bottom-four battle.
FFPL.Ytterby Yetis: Deep trouble at 86.9% relegation probability. The Yetis are very likely headed to the relegation playoffs and will need to win there to stay up.
FFPL.One Direction Two: Locked into relegation playoffs (100%). One Direction Two's only question now is seeding - they'll be fighting for survival in the loser bracket.
FFPL.East Shore Boys: Confirmed for relegation playoffs (100%). Like One Direction Two, the Boys know their fate - win in the relegation bracket or face the drop.
